channel.title: [317] IndexOutOfBoundsException help [317]
channel.description:
Hello, whenever i try to do the "::bank" command, it just disconnects me and instantly reconnects me. The command works fine for anyone with playerrights <= 1 but any right higher it just disconnects you. My ::bank command:
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && playerRights >= 0){ openUpBank(); }
The error i receive on my Run.bat:
[client-1-xxxxx]: playerCommand: bank java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -4 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:13501) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:23044) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18939) at client.packetSending(client.java:18880) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:190) at server.main(server.java:49)

item.title: [317] IndexOutOfBoundsException help [317]
item.dc:creator: @arean1 arean1
item.description:
@arean1 wrote:

Zymus:

Can you post your customCommand method? And mark where line 13501 is?

Ahh, I got it fixed now. Thankyou very much for the guidance Zymus. Line 13501 was my “::ban” command.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] IndexOutOfBoundsException help [317]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:
